solution_line_template: These friends have invited another {total_invited_friends} friends * {friends_bring_along_count} = <<{total_invited_friends}*{friends_bring_along_count}={friends_brought_by_friends}>>{friends_brought_by_friends} people.

So in total, there are {total_invited_friends} friends + {friends_brought_by_friends} people = <<{total_invited_friends}+{friends_brought_by_friends}={total_people_at_party}>>{total_people_at_party} people going to Michonne’s party.
